support.title: Introduction to bread-making workshop
support.descp:
Eoin Cluskey runs bread-making workshops at Bread 41 that are so popular they're booked out until 2023. But this is your EXCLUSIVE chance to nab a spot next year! Eoin will take you through the fundamentals of baking bread in a 3-hour class on site at his Dublin bakery. There will be wine, cheese and plenty of chats and you will literally break bread together.
If you want to take part in this workshop with Eoin in 2022, pledging for it here is the only way you'll be able to get a spot as Eoin has opened them up just for Kickstarter backers. Places are strictly limited to 10, so don't miss out!
Please note that the date of this workshop will need to be confirmed later on due to ongoing Covid-19 restrictions and that it may take place at any point during 2022, not necessarily January.
INCLUDES:
Introduction to bread-making workshop
Phone or computer wallpaper
Newsletter

support.title: Private group bread-making workshop
support.descp:
Eoin Cluskey runs bread-making workshops at Bread 41 that are so popular they're booked out until 2023. But this is your EXCLUSIVE chance to nab a spot next year! Eoin has created five private group workshops for up to six people, perfect for a group of friends or a team-building evening.
Eoin will take your group through the fundamentals of baking bread in a 3-hour class on site at his Dublin bakery. There will be wine, cheese and plenty of chats and you will literally break bread together.
If you want to book this workshop with Eoin in 2022, pledging for it here is the only way you'll be able to as Eoin has opened them up just for Kickstarter backers. The number of these private group workshops is strictly limited to five, so don't miss out!
Please note that the date of this workshop will need to be confirmed later on due to ongoing Covid-19 restrictions and that it may take place at any point during 2022, not necessarily January.

support.title: Private dinner cooked by Jess Murphy
support.descp:
Jess Murphy from Kai Restaurant in Galway is one of Ireland's most beloved chefs. Exclusively for this Kickstarter campaign, Jess will cook for a group of up to eight people for a private dinner party in your home. Jess's food at Kai is vital, bold and delicious and is based on the friendships she has built with her range of suppliers close by and around the country. This is your chance to get that special Kai experience in your own home.
The number of these private dinners is strictly limited to three and is only available to addresses in County Galway, so don't miss out! Please note that this price includes food only - alcohol is not included.
Also note that the date of your dinner will need to be confirmed later on due to ongoing Covid-19 restrictions and that it may take place at any point during 2022, not necessarily January.
INCLUDES:
Private dinner cooked by Jess Murphy
Phone or computer wallpaper
Newsletter

campaign.story:
Fragonard's The Swing, reimagined by Shouty
What if we took art history and made it gay?
Hi! We're Nova and Mali, and we like making collaborative gay art projects. Our goal is to create an art book full of famous works of art you probably recognize, but we're making them gay, trans, and POC inclusive!
You want to see the Birth of Venus but trans? We got you.
Leyendecker but lesbians? We've got that too.
Successfully funded in only two hours, and stretch goals all reached in five hours!
Kickstarter marked us a project they love and we've been featured in the Mary Sue and Fangirlish!
Mock-up of the front and back cover of the book
Our hard cover art book will be in full color, filled to the brim with beautiful reimagined works of art from Ancient Greece to 20th century Rockwell. 
A mock-up of the book's interior, featuring Aadorah's finished piece and Blackdistraction's WIP
The cover has been beautifully painted by Shouty (Shouty_y), reimagining Fragonard's The Swing as a new stunning piece! We've gathered over 60 artists from around the world and each is creating a new piece of art for us.
Our wonderful artists!
Our campaign graphic design was created by our very own Floh (FlohGna) who is also illustrating a piece for the book. Thank you Floh!
This is our second project - we successfully ran Lady Tarot Cards last year (2020), reaching all of our stretch goals and more with nearly $40,000 raised. Quite a few artists from the cards have come over to work on this book too and we're thrilled to have them back.
(Small note: we are out of the tarot cards - we ended up selling them all! We are not planning a reprint at this time as it would take over 500 orders to consider it which is basically an additional KS campaign!)
Some of our tarot cards!
Our tarot cards with their foiled sides and their tuck box
Our Book
Mock-up showing the book's cover
Our book will be 8.5x11 inches and have a soft matte touch hardcover and filled with over 60 different works of art from over 60 artists! This is an ongoing project with art still being created - some designs may change but the overall feel will of course be the same.
All orders of the book will now include 1 holographic print from cleocatart - their piece is based on Leighton's The Fisherman and the Syren.
Mock-up of the interior, showing Vicky's WIP and Pien's finished piece
The Merch
Our merch pack and the shiny bits!
Each merch pack will have:
 1 sticker designed by karlovycross (design coming soon based on Le Flirt a La Rose by LeClerc) (this might end up being a glitter or holographic sticker too!!!!)
 1 metal bookmark designed by mayticks featuring Hades and Persephone, Theseus and a Fury, and Orpheus and Eurydice!
 3 holographic art print 6x9 inches of fidisart's piece based on Mucha's Flirt and two more yet to be determined!
 3 random postcards from a selection of art from the book
 Your choice of 1 of 3 acrylic charms designed by rosefinchie and renstrapp! Rose  designed two charms: one with cave hand paintings and one with Artemisia Gentileschi. The cave painting design is being workshopped into possibly being glow in the dark, and Artemisia is a clear charm! Ren created a design with Venus de Milo and Nike of Samothrace as girlfriends.
 An embroidered patch designed by Mayticks! Her patch features Hades and Persephone...and some innocuous pomegranates.
Some designs are still TBD as our artists complete their work!
Close up view of our shiny shiny bookmark from Mayticks!
Support Levels/Pledge Tiers
Early bird pledge description and graphics
 The first 20 people to pledge for the book and book/merch levels get a discounted price!
These early bird tiers are:
Art book - digital and physical - $35 (plus shipping)
Art book (digital and physical) and merch - $60 (plus shipping)
Pledge levels and graphics!
 Our normal support level tiers are:
Digital book only - $15
Merch only - $30 (plus shipping)
Art book (digital and physical) - $40 (plus shipping)
Art book (digital and physical) and merch - $70 (plus shipping)
2 x Art books and merch - $130 (plus shipping)
A reminder: if we unlock levels below in the stretch goals, those items will be automatically included in your pledges!
Our limited edition tier
Finally, we have one limited edition tier! This tier includes the books and merch PLUS a limited edition linograph print from Mayticks of her version of Klimt's The Kiss (A3 size - 29.7 x 42 cm, 11.75 x 16.5 in). We have 25 prints available!
Art book (digital and physical), Merch, and 1 print - $150 (plus shipping)
Mayticks' lino prints!
We will be using BackerKit for this project and you'll get emails from them later on about shipping addresses. You'll also get a chance to add-on any additional items and a few leftover merch choices from Lady Tarot Cards. Finally, you'll be able to pre-order more copies and merch through there before we launch our online store - when the store launches, the prices will no longer have the discounted KS prices you find here!
Reminder: Kickstarter doesn't charge you unless/until we get funded - that means your card won't be charged until May! You can adjust your pledge or cancel it until May 5. We of course hope you won't cancel a pledge, but understand that things are very tough right now.
This book will not be reprinted - this is a one run deal and we'll order enough to cover the KS orders, our pre-orders in the store, and enough to stock the store for a while. After we run out, that'll be it!
Our Stretch Goals
Graphic showing our unlocked stretch goals!
ALL STRETCH GOALS UNLOCKED ON DAY ONE!!!
At $35,000, all the books will have a soft touch matte hardcover!
At $40,000, all merch packs will include your choice of 3 acrylic charms, designed by rosefinchie and renstrapp!
Renstrapp is creating a keychain design with Venus de Milo and Nike of Samothrace as girlfriends, and rosefinchie designed two charms: one with cave hand paintings and one with Artemisia Gentileschi. The cave painting design is being workshopped into possibly being glow in the dark!
At $45,000, all merch packs will include an embroidered patch designed by Mayticks! Her patch features Hades and Persephone...and some innocuous pomegranates.
At $50,000, all merch packs will include 3 holographic prints (1 from fidisarts and 2 others), and all physical orders will include 1 holographic print from cleocatart - their piece is based on Leighton's The Fisherman and the Syren.
NEW STRETCH GOAL!
This campaign has surpassed all of our hopes and is firmly in the WOW category! We're announcing a new stretch goal for $150k - a solid 3D metal keychain featuring Mayticks' Hades and Persephone design!! This would be included with every merch pack, and available for purchase as an add-on after the campaign in the Backerkit survey. Let's get to work sharing this around so we can get these bad bois unlocked!
Mayticks' design for the keychain
Mayticks' keychain!
The Timeline and Funding
Our timeline is of course dependent on a lot of things, including but not limited to: artists finishing their work, products being made in a timely manner, shipping to us with minimal delays, packing and shipping everything (it's just the two of us so it might take a few extra days!), and then shipping out to you!
Ideally, our timeline is as follows:
April - May - Kickstarter campaign runs and the funds get sent to us in May
May - June - Artists complete their pieces
July - August - We compile everything and get things sent to production. Some of the merch is already ready to go - the biggest work will be for us to format the book for print to ensure the highest quality images.
September - November - A nice big window for us to receive and send out the goodies, ideally BEFORE the holiday postal rush.
We will be keeping everyone up to date with updates as we go through the process, especially when we receive products in the mail! This is going to have some really amazing things created and we can't wait to be able to show you.
Our funding process covers the products, shipping, and all the taxes/fees, and everything else is used to pay our artists and mods!
We've been through this rodeo before so we know some backers forget or miss the backer survey when we ask for your address. It is your responsibility to make sure your email is correct so we can send you important updates and messages! We will hold your pledge goodies for six months after we send out the last call message, and we will try our absolute best to get in contact with you - we don't want anyone to miss out. After that six months, we will no longer hold your goodies and cannot offer a refund - we have a very small apartment and we need the space!
Shipping
We will ship anywhere in the world in sturdy cardboard mailers. We are not responsible for lost or damaged packages, and many will take a long time to get to you especially for our international friends. We are also experiencing a much higher volume of orders than we expected so even with the help of a few friends, our packing/sending process will take a little longer - please be patient with us :)
We CAN ship to the UK, even with the new VAT rules, thanks to the project being a book! Shipping is expensive right now with many countries/postal carriers adding extra surcharges to their rates - please be aware of that when you click through to the shipping options. Most packages are $15/30 for domestic (USA) and international packages.
We are not responsible for any additional customs/duties on packages. We will be declaring them as printed matter/books/postcards/bookmarks/etc as appropriate and we of course hope there won't be any issues - the labels will not include any indication of LGBT content.
Our digital book can be emailed easily to anywhere anytime! (after, of course, it's made and ready to send out this fall!)
About us!
Nova and Mali have been married for a few years now and spend most of their free time working with their endless cycle of rescue foster kittens! They ran a successful project during 2020 to create nearly 800 decks of tarot cards and sent them all over the world.
Photo of Mali and Nova from their wedding photos
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our biggest risk, assuming we get funded, is timing. Our timeline is a best guess - things can go awry with quality control and shipping to us, causing delays. We will communicate these issues as best we can as they happen, and keep everyone informed.
Lately the shipping scene is a mess. We can't be responsible for lost or damaged packages due to postage negligence.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Thank you everyone for helping to make the Kickstarter successful!  If you couldn't make it in time, wishlist Breakwaters on Steam and join us on Discord.
If you have questions about the rewards, please message us on Kickstarter or reach out to use on Discord or Twitter.
In the ocean depths lies the key to defeating Titans and bringing calm to the waves. Sail the waters to find new islands & resources to build, craft, and survive.  Explore the world and uncover ancient secrets about the truth of the Titans if you wish to save the people on the land.

Breakwaters is a unique exploration survival game that is on track to ship single player and co-op gameplay later this year, but we need your help.  Partner with us to take Breakwaters forward so it can release in its best possible way and add your personal touch to the world.

Key Features
Online co-op and Single player
Massive ocean sim that creates a unique interactive open world experience
Defeat Titans as large as an island and fight Golems as big as a house.
Gather crystals and refine them into items which displace and deform the ocean revealing rich resources below.
Build  structures that interact with the world scale ocean simulation.  Turn a valley into a lake or open the doors and flood the lowlands.
Craft items to suit your play style whether it be farmer, explorer, adventurer.
Build and customize your boat to handle Titans, rough weather, and local enemies.
Massive world filled with procedural islands and unique biomes.
Dynamic time of day and weather.
Breakwaters has a powerful ocean sim at its core.  It interacts with everything in the world and you can interact directly with it.  Build walls to hold it back or use refined crystals to displace it and venture into its depths.
Refined Yellow Crystal repels water revealing resources below
Refined Blue Crystal creates water
Use ancient lighthouses to reveal submerged structures full of monsters and treasure. 
Discover ancient ruins hidden below the water
Titans are ancient relics of a past civilization.  They roam the ocean, destroying anything that gets too close or draws their attention for too long.
Turtle Titan - A large biped Titan which displaces water anywhere it walks.  Its armor prevents any attack of opportunity.
Serpent Titan - Swimming in the ocean depths, they cause whirlpools and typhoons.  Defeating a Serpent Titan requires either a fast or a strong boat.
Crab Titan - There is little recorded evidence of Crab Titans.  What has been recorded indicates they walk up from the oceans depths directly onto an island and attack anything unwise enough to stand in their way.
Titans are relics of an ancient civilization
The destructive force of a Titan can scare even the most prepared, but the rewards gained from defeating one are said to be greater than anything found on any island.
Titans have multiple unique destructive attacks
The world is full of different biomes and unique resources.  Build a boat, add contraptions to fit your play style, and set off for adventure.
Explore the world to find new biomes, islands, and people with unique missions.
 Traveling by raft, boat, glider, or on foot are all useful depending on the situation.
 Although the world is ravaged by Titans, there are also massive creatures which are more friendly and willing to let you say hello.
 "Its dangerous to go alone"... bring a friend!
Online co-op is important to us in addition to a compelling single player experience.
Build a home base together
Explore the world with friends in online co-op
Refined Crystals
The ocean water in Breakwaters contains unique minerals which form into powerful crystals.  Each type interacts with water in a different way, and can be used to power Items and Contraptions for unique results. 
Harvest plants from land and sea. Find rare seeds to grow in your farm.  Some plants are like rice and will require flooded fields while other plants require dryer soil.
Build, earn, or buy new items to improve your ability to build, attack, defend, and farm.
Some weapons can be improved by inserting crystals into slots as upgrades.
Weapon upgrades 
Items can be upgraded on a work bench by placing a Skill gem in a weapons socket. Each Skill gem integrated into a weapon will increase its capability.  Skill gems are harvested from the world and are considered valuable trade items among the locals.

The world of Breakwaters is populated by many creatures, each with their own way of surviving.  In addition to each type of creature and monster in the world there are different skill levels and difficulties.
Contraptions provide powerful ways to interact with the world.  Improve your home, make survival easier, or set up automated defenses.
Crystals and contraptions go hand in hand to make unique items and new interactions with the ocean.
Cannons: great for combat and chopping trees down!
Move water around and power contraptions with pumps and pipes
Grab sunken treasure from the ocean floor
Scoop items into a wagon for quick transport
Cooking!
Biomes and islands are procedural spawned in a unique way for every player.  They are populated with plants, animals, and unique points of interest to explore.  Everything in the world can be destroyed or harvested except ancient stone, the same material Titans are mostly carved from.
Each biome has unique plants, animals, and monsters
For the initial early access launch, our goal is to ship the Tropical, Rocky, Pine, and Swamp biomes.  A variety of plants and animals are planned for each biome along with unique point of interest interactions.  Some of these interactions are small local experiences, others create large changes which affect the water and islands across the world.
Procedural Islands with infinite variety
 Weather is a dynamic element in the world impacted by many factors.
The time of day
Proximity of a Titan
The current state of nearby ancient structures
Unique powerful items
Lightning can start fires. Fires can be put out with Refined Blue Crystal.
The result of weather on the world can range from mild to dangerous.  Large waves can make it difficult to sail.  Thick fog can obscure a nearby island.  Lightning can damage you or catch trees on fire.  Rain washes down hills, collects in valleys, and adds to the ocean sim.

Unique day/night sensitive plants and animals create different resources based on what time of day they are harvested.
Dynamic day and night cycle
During the day you can harvest regular coral, but at night you can harvest bio-luminescent coral.  Unique plants and animals only exist at specific times of day, like fireflies at night.
Biolumenesent plants and animals
Uncover an ancient mystery long hidden deep within the ocean and become a Breakwater, a protector of the people.  Voyage across the seas and defeat ancient Titans that have ravaged the oceans for centuries.  Displace the ocean and delve into their depths to find rare resources.

Titans, ancient relics of a past civilization, have disturbed the oceans and destroyed the land for as long as anyone can remember.  The only thing we know is they are connected somehow to the power crystals which form from the ocean waters.
Discover the world's secrets, delve into the ocean depths, and become the hero long needed; become a Breakwater.

 Michael Bross (composer/audio director/sound designer) 
Michael is composing all of the music for Breakwaters.  He has composed for Ratchet & Clank, Oddworld, Honor of Kings, Counter-Strike GO, and many other games.  Above is the Title song he recently finished for the game.  We are extremely excited to have him on board and cant wait to share more of his work with you.
We are currently in the middle of Production for Breakwaters and are expecting to ship into PC Early Access in late Q2 or early Q3 2021.  We are planning for a Beta around mid April followed by an Online co-op beta when those features are ready to test in larger groups.

Production will continue after PC Early Access launch to add additional world, enemies, missions, new community requested features, items, and bug fixes.  We estimate a console early access build around September (TBD based on console approval speed).  Full product release to all platforms is expected to happen in late fall 2021.
Planned localization
We are a small indie studio started in 2019.  Our team is made up of 4 people who have been passionately working on Breakwaters together for the past 6 months.  Before that, Breakwaters was a solo project started in the summer of 2019.  We are excited to play Breakwaters with everyone soon and hope to continue building unique indie games to share with the world.
Phillip (Code, Art, Design)
17 year Tech Art Director industry veteran, Phillip has been part of the  creative leadership on AAA games, Hololens, and Windows Mixed Reality.   He has worked on Quantum Conundrum, Roboraid, The Agency, Dark Void,  Xbox one, and HoloStudio.
Sergey (Art, Design)
11 years of 2D & 3D content experience. Experienced Art Director,  Concept artist, and 3D artist on both established and new I.P.’s.   Sergey has contributed to Crucible, Murdered soul suspect, Breakaway,  and Dark Void.
Spencer (Code, Design)
Junior programmer from DigiPen: Institute of Technology. He previously worked at Microsoft on the Minecraft Earth and Minecraft Character Creator teams.  His dog's name is Banjo, named after Banjo-Kazooie.
Brenna (Art)
Junior 3D artist with 3 years of experience. Has worked for Hasbro, Gameloft and Trigger the mixed reality agency. She has worked on titles such as Hero vision Iron Man, Nova Legacy, and The Mandalorian Season 2 AR App.

campaign.story:
Blake has been dreaming of the Black Dog.
In fae folklore the Black Dog is an omen of death.  Terrible and inevitable.  But is it only a dream, or a portent of things to come?  What does the dog want?

CW: Death of children, mild gore
SERVANT OF THE BLACK DOG is self contained, 71 pages, full color, digest size comic.  It follows Blake as she tries to distinguish if the black dog she is seeing in her dreams is the 'real' thing, or just an overactive imagination.  And if it is real, how can she make it leave?

Funding would provide print and shipping costs for the book.  As things stand now, I'm only printing the book.  But if the campaign should do fantastically well, I will think very hard about possible stretch goals.  Otherwise, I just want this baby printed and out there for people to read.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The story is done, I just need to run it by someone who is better at grammar than me. So all we'd be waiting on really is the printing. I've factored in a pretty conservative estimate of how long it should take to print and ship, but as I say with every Kickstarter, things be crazy. I've never missed a Kickstarter deadline before, but anything could happen. Even so, I will try my level best.

campaign.story:
Music is the comic artist’s companion. We listen to it when we draw, when we brainstorm, and even when we’ve finished a long day of work. It provides an endless array of emotions, from peace and excitement, to sadness and joy. But, no matter the genre, music always bestows bountiful sources of inspiration. Because of this, the Level Ground Comics Team brought together 16 artists to orchestrate an anthology that’s all about music!
From left to right: Taku Ward, Sarah Davidson, and Kailyn D'Elena
The Greatest Hits: A Comics Mixtape is a curated collection of comics by grassroots publisher, Level Ground Comics. Our second all-ages anthology showcases our dedication to help new creators break into the comics industry. The result of our continued collaboration is “The Greatest Hits,” which features a playlist of stories where music is instrumental to the plot.
This book features the work of 16 comic creators spread across 64 black-and-white pages. Each story is 4 pages long and is held together in a compact 5.5 x 8.5 inch softcover book with a beautiful cover by Sarah Davidson. 
From left to right: Mariana Mora, Angelique Roselli, and Grayson Bowling
In addition to providing paid opportunities to up-and-coming comic artists, Level Ground Comics was founded to give young editors experience. Meet the producers!

Although we are a small group, it is important to us that we are able to pay our artists. Limited resources, however, restrict how much we can pay them, but as we are able to raise money beyond covering our basic costs, we can ensure they are paid well for their work! Each stretch goal of $800 will go towards giving our artists a 25% pay raise! We'll have four stretch goals that, if met, will double our artists' pay! If we meet those stretch goals, we are then going to aim to increase the size of our book from 5.5 x 8.5 inches to  6 x 9 inches. And finally, if all of those goals are met, we'd like to get an ISBN bar code on the back of our book. ISBNs are a system libraries and shops use to organize their stocks, so having the ISBN makes the book read as a more quality product to them. 
THE STRETCH GOALS:

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since we're still a new group, the biggest risk we have right now is meeting our goal. Additionally, as with many other projects going live right now, the biggest concern will be timely shipping. To help alleviate that stress, all of the artwork for the book and Kickstarter tiers are complete, and the book will be formatted to send off to print as soon as the campaign is over. We also have access to screen-printing facilities to create our t-shirt designs, which will speed up production. We have learned from our last campaign and have worked hard to streamline our fulfillment process and have created back-up plans for the more labor intensive tier rewards. We are confident that we will get this project to you!

campaign.story:
A cursed suit of armour and the knight who dons it; a lovestruck student desperate to impress the professor's daughter; a young girl tasked with caring for a terrible beast; a witch working to turn the moon into a new home for humanity...
Four fantastical stories from four of Scotland's most exciting creators, published by brand new comics publisher Quindrie Press! Each book is a compact 127x191mm - standard manga size - and is available to buy separately or as a bundle at a discount.
Please see the FAQ for information on shipping. 
If you are a retailer interested in ordering multiple copies of the books, please contact Eve Greenwood at evegwood@yahoo.co.uk.

The Books
Wolvendaughter by Ver: Bent on destruction, the Beast cuts a terrible swathe through towns and countryside, accompanied by its lone herald, the Daughter. A fable about the cycle of ruin and rebirth, perseverance, duty, and a grim hope. 48 pages (contains violence).
 "...really special and expertly delivered." - Comic Book News UK
Ver (they) is a writer and illustrator from Eastern Europe residing in Scotland. They spend most of their time writing and drawing stories about strange people and distant worlds. Read more about Ver in their Artist Spotlight!
 twitter | tumblr 
The Beechwood Helm by Letty Wilson: Returning home from battle through a beech forest, two knights come upon a strange figure in red armour, who challenges them to a fight to the death. Answering the challenge invites a terrible curse, which only love can break. 48 pages (contains violence, blood, and death).
"It's bloody beautiful in every way." - Comic Book News UK
"...absolutely and perfectly haunting." - Hari Conner (Finding Home)
Letty Wilson (they/she) is an artist and writer from Scotland. She lives in Glasgow, where she records the cursed artifacts she finds, and gets emotional about trees. She makes a webcomic about fairies with criminal tendencies called Owl People. Read more about Letty in her Artist Spotlight!
 website | twitter | instagram | Owl People 

The Nightingale and the Rose by Jem Milton: In a remote magical college, a student pines after their beautiful potions partner. Hoping to help the student to capture her heart, a nightingale who believes in true love begins a journey to find them a red rose to complete a spell, but after a long, cruel winter the only way to conjure a red rose is to pay a terrible price. 48 pages (contains blood).
 "Another great title for the incredibly talented Jem Milton." - Comic Book News UK
Jem Milton (they/he) is a non-binary comic artist based in Glasgow. They like to make comics that take classic fairytale stories and retell them with a queer twist. Their current longterm project is a free to read webcomic based on Russian folklore, following the story of a grumpy girl and her quest to win the hand of a princess with the help of her friends, her dog, and a Flying Ship. Read more about Jem in their Artist Spotlight!
 website | twitter | instagram | The Flying Ship 

What the Witch Saw by Thomas Heitler: The United Nations sends a team of Witches to terraform the moon into a world lush with life. Even though they're working for a brighter future, one Witch finds herself struggling with her past. 44 pages (contains death).
Thomas Heitler (he) is a freelance comic book artist and writer. He has a Masters with Distinction in Comics & Graphic Novels from the University of Dundee and a Bachelors of Fine Art from Gray's School of Art. He spends most of his time drawing, writing, and dreaming of strange worlds. Read more about Thomas in his Artist Spotlight!
 twitter | instagram 

The Printset
The print bundle reward (£30) also comes with a Kickstarter-exclusive A5 printset from illustrator and comic creator Robbie Kieran (he) (twitter | instagram), featuring the Quindrie Press mascot Snorkel. Read more about Robbie in his Artist Spotlight!
Stretch Goals
For every £500 that this campaign raises above the £10,000 goal, each comic artist will receive a further £50 on top of their original payment. Any leftover money from the campaign will go towards funding future Quindrie books!

About Quindrie Press
Quindrie Press is a new Edinburgh-based independent publisher with a focus on providing creators with the opportunity to work on passion project comics. We have a particular interest in helping marginalised and upcoming European creators to publish their work. You can find us at quindriepress.com.
 website | twitter | instagram | quindriepress@gmail.com
 Quindrie Press was founded by Eve Greenwood (they). Eve is Scottish comic creator with a Masters of Design degree in Comics & Graphic Novels. Some of their previous work includes Orange Plates, Guide to Kroma, and the ongoing award-shortlisted webcomic Inhibit.
 website | twitter | evegwood@yahoo.co.uk
 Our in-house editor is Alex Assan (they/he). Alex has a first class BA (Hons) degree in Illustration, Graphic Novels & Children’s Publishing. Some of their previous comic work includes Shaderunners, Mysteries of the Spectral Hour, and the award-winning Captain Imani & the Cosmic Chase. They were also the co-editor for the 2019 Come Together anthology. 
 website | twitter 

Press
 “Quindrie is Centred on the Idea of Helping Creators to Publish Passion Project Comics” – Quindrie Press Founder Eve Greenwood on Amplifying Emerging and Marginalised Voices (Broken Frontier)

Although this is our first project as Quindrie Press, I have already successfully fulfilled two previous Kickstarter projects. All of the comics are either 100% ready for print or in the final stages of production, and we will be printing all rewards with manufacturers we have used before and are well-acquainted with.

Currently the only delay would be problems with shipping the rewards to ourselves or to our backers. We will be sure to let people know if we encounter any issues, and ask that backers be aware that there may be further shipping delays out of our control due to Covid-19. BITTER X SWEET: A WLW ZINE is an art zine featuring the artworks of over 30 individuals. The theme revolves around the beloved ship dynamic of an edgy, punk or goth girl who is in love with a bright, spunky girl. 

The works in this zine feature both fanart and original works. Inside the book, you will find both illustrations and comics, each crafted by incredibly skilled LGBT+ artists celebrating their love for WLW (women who love women) relationship tropes. The book is inclusive of trans and nonbinary identities.

The zine features 34 artists total, including 29 page artists and 5 merch artists.
Special guest artists include Bev Johnson,  Elise (troubledmn), Amelia Allore (mimiadraws), ira prince valls (baph0meat), and eunnieboo. Cover art is done by illustrator fabsno. 

The zine itself will be 5.5x8.5” and have roughly 50 pages of beautiful gay art with a wrap-around cover illustration. 
Illustrations by Troubledmn and Bev Johnson

campaign.story:
It is the year 1562. Hidden in nebulas and surrounded by reefs off the Arabian coast lies the ancient island of Dioscoria. Founded by priestesses and sages cast out by the hierophants of their homelands, it is a safe haven for mystics, misfits, rebels, and outcasts from neighbouring and distant shores.
Sheltered from the wrath of the orthodoxies, this Discorian society favours empathy, playfulness, and prowess of the mind. To celebrate these traits, Dioscorians cherish one pastime as old as the island itself—Sefirot, a game of divination.


The game of Sefirot combines the worlds of Tarot divination and board gaming into an activity that is both meditative and playful. It is played in numerous variations on different playing fields, using a deck of specially designed Tarot cards.
Tree of Life - the solitaire board
The game includes 3 variations:
solitaire mode (Know Thyself)
cooperative 2-player mode (Lovers’ Discourse)
competitive 2-player mode (Warring Planets)
As the players place their cards onto the playing fields, higher powers decide upon each player’s destiny, their triumph, or their downfall. 
Starfield - the 2-player mode board
In addition to being the central component of the board game, the meticulously designed custom Sefirot Tarot deck also provides new journeys into the realms of Tarot.
Sefirot is suitable for an audience from 12 years onwards and has an average playing time from 30 to 60 minutes.


Very early in this project, game designer Georg Hobmeier and artists Eli Baum & Viv Tanner decided to venture beyond the well-trodden paths of the Rider-Waite-Smith and Marseille Tarot conventions to create a distinctive new kind of Tarot deck. This deck would become the centerpiece of the game of Sefirot.
For their inspiration, the creators chose the ancient island of Dioscoria. Based on esoteric tales,  pieces of history, and many strands of yarn between, this mystical place would become the heart of their ongoing creation, while also drawing from traditions like the Judaic Kabbalah to which they have a personal connection. 
This Dioscorian Sefirot deck provides novel ways to interact with Tarot cards, while also introducing the world of Tarot to an audience beyond those interested in the occult and divination.
Every card in the Sefirot Tarot deck has been designed from scratch, through a process that includes copious hours of reference collection and research. The deck draws inspiration from existing Tarot conventions while seeking its own path, to create a final design that challenges the status quo of existing Tarot orthodoxies.

The game of Sefirot may be played on two distinct fields, printed on a double-sided board. The Tree of Life is used for the solitaire mode, while the celestial Starfield is utilized for 2-player variations. Both fields have been developed with the same attention to detail as the Tarot deck, and the board comes crafted in the finest quality.
Richly decorated with elements of Dioscorian lore, the board not only serves as a play area for the game, but provides additional layers of meaning for those wishing to engage in the divination process.
This is one of the unique propositions of Sefirot—play the game on these fields as a simple leisure activity, or, use the cards to explore your inner-self or your relationship with another person. Explore the fields even deeper to discover the hidden meanings of their constellations and symbologies.


The rules of Sefirot are purposefully accessible, devised from a blend of solitaire and other card game mechanics. The game is not meant to impress with complex instructions, but rather to foster exploration and communication.
While Tarot cards have always been used for casual card play, our proposition—to use them in a hybrid capacity (for both a game and divinatory activity)—is new. We see this as an exciting starting point for new discourse within the board gaming and Tarot communities. We welcome our backers to actively participate in this journey as we develop new rules and variations that utilize the Sefirot deck.
You can find a preview version of the rules here. Please be advised that the Ace of Pentacles pledge will not come with this document, but the final version of the rules for this edition that will also have the appropriate visual components. 
For those who want a more visual introduction to the game, the wonderful people of Moonshadow Garden made this exquisite video. It's a session of Sefirot's coop mode, hosted by our game designer Georg: 


This project offers 10 backable tiers, and several optional add-ons. We also have several additional items and upgrades that were already unlocked:  

Two stickers & one sticker set: free for all physical tiers
Free bookmark: all physical tiers
Free upgrades on Tarot deck components: any tier or add-on that includes the standalone Tarot deck
Free upgrades on board game components: any tier or add-on that includes the board game
 Altar Cloth: free for Queen of Pentacles, Queen of Wands & King of Pentacles, can be purchased as add-on otherwise
One additional free print for all tiers and add-ons containing prints
Free gold foil upgrade on art book: any tier including the art book + the add-on
Free accordion fold with Dioscorian scenery: all physical tiers
  Precious art prints, each measuring 5.8 × 8.3 inches, as featured in the Three of Cups pledge
The full Sefirot deck with 78 Tarot cards, printed on premium card stock and housed in a slide box, as featured in the Nine of Pentacles pledge
Two 1.5" hard enamel pins based on elements included in Sefirot, the mysterious celestial beings Ophan and the Ouroboros, as featured in the Nine of Cups pledge
The Sefirot board game: a spectacular flip-top box with a two-sided board, a bridge-sized (3.5 x 2.25”) deck of 78 cards and a rulebook, as featured in the Ten of Pentacles pledge
The formidable Sefirot art book, featured in the Eight of Pentacles pledge: With approximately 120 pages, this 8.27 x 11.69" book will feature all the art used in the Tarot deck and game
The King of Pentacles pledge will provide all items of this campaign. They will be housed in a large wooden case handcrafted by Budapest’s most respected box makers.
The King of Pentacles pledge is also watched over by the loving grace of a 7-7.8" custom hand-painted figurine of The Empress.
Figurine crafted by Bakanoë.
Please be advised that the displayed graphics and designs still might be altered for the final product.


Additionally, you can also get various items on top to create your own custom bundles. These can be added when making a pledge. We also have a handful of mystery items that are yet to be revealed throughout the campaign.


We look forward to unlocking these stretch goals with you to reveal a plethora of upgrades! The further we go, the more opulent these upgrades will become.


We know the Sefirot deck and game board will shine beautifully on their own. But with support from backers, we can give Sefirot an even more luxurious, collectible feel and quality.
To produce the majority of the items for Sefirot—the Tarot deck and board game, along with all the presented components and add-ons—we have selected one of Europe’s oldest card factories. With skilled craftspeople and centuries of experience, they will work with us to manufacture every part of Sefirot to meet exceptional standards of quality.
In the true spirit of Kickstarter, this project has already been substantially developed. We are asking for your support to bring it to fruition. With our Kickstarter goals fulfilled, we will work with our backers during 2021 to complete dozens of card designs and finalize all the components of Sefirot. Then, once we make sure everything is just right, we will start manufacturing for delivery in Spring 2022.


We intend to both produce and ship from Central European facilities. This gives us a very equitable price for astonishing quality. It also means a smaller environmental impact, since our goods won’t need to travel several times across the globe.
Shipping costs will be calculated and charged after this Kickstarter project concludes. Costs will be collected via our pledge manager, using Stripe. (At that time, you will also have the opportunity to make additional purchases through this pledge manager.)
The following are rough estimates of shipping costs for the Sefirot Tarot deck or board game. Note that these are merely estimates. Accurate costs will be calculated in the pledge manager system according to your address, and purchasing additional items may increase these costs. 
EU VAT is included in all of our rewards and will not be charged additionally!



Sefirot is being made by the game developers of Causa Creations in close cooperation with the artist duo Eli Baum and Viv Tanner.
Support Crew
Additional support for this project has been provided by Small Furry Games (editorial, consulting, copywriting), Moonshadowgarden (ads, additional media), Bakanoë (3D Sculpting), Wobblersound (trailer audio mastering), Thomas Ortsik (research, press), Lisa Nielsen-Spieler (trailer voice over), Reinhold Bidner (trailer motion graphics), Christian Knapp (analytics & finances), Brian Main (additional communication), Sarah Hiebl (design consulting & coaching), gold extra (production support), and Leali Heyman (Hebrew consulting, dentistry).
Thank you to all the supporters who have helped us reach this milestone through the power of kind words, helping hands, and cunning playtesting!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
To back a Kickstarter project is to put your faith in its creators. Here are some reasons you can trust us to follow through with Sefirot:

* We have done this before. Our artists have successfully run a Kickstarter campaign for a different project, and are supporting us with all of their wisdom. (Have a look at their previous exploits: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/vivtanner/heart-of-gold-volume-i)

* We have carefully priced all of our shipping and printing expenses for the rewards included in this project, and have received quotes for fulfillment. 

* Both production and shipping will be based in Central Europe to help mitigate current mail delays and complications, especially for backers in the area. 

* While we are still putting the finishing touches on several art pieces for Sefirot, we have a track record of completing creative projects on time, as planned. Once funded, we have every intention of completing and delivering Sefirot as scheduled. 

Sometimes the best-laid plans are not immune from surprises (pandemics, for example). But rest assured, our team has worked in the world of digital game development—a special circle of damnation when it comes to nasty surprises! Regardless of what the Fates throw our way, with your support and our team’s expertise, we know we can bring this adventure to a magnificent conclusion!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
All Sefirot components will be manufactured to the highest possible standards of quality. They will last substantially longer than the average card or board game.
Sustainable Distribution
Our planned production and fulfillment options are located very close to each other in Germany. This will drastically reduce the amount of fuel and transportation required when compared to similar operations that often ship items numerous times across the globe.

updates.update_content:
Stellar Beings,

These are busy days for all things logistics, but we would like to use this update to chat about a few other things to throw some sparks into (y)our minds.
If you would like to take a peek behind the curtains of our machinery and learn more about the history of the project, we would like to invite you to a post-mortem talk that will happen tomorrow (June 10th) on 7PM CET at Vienna’s gaming hub Subotron. No teleportation across the oceans is required, the talk will be held online. Follow this link to learn more and join this one hour session.

updates.update_userinfo: On Incoming Surveys, Eager Minds & Hidden Kings
updates.update_content:
Stellar beings,
We are back in the card making business and it is a delight! You might already have seen the first outcome of this new phase, it is the handsome Page of Wands. What a fitting card to start anew with fresh energies and dedication. For there is much to do.

updates.update_userinfo: On Ongoing Tasks and Helping Hands
updates.update_content:
Stellar beings,

It’s good to be back and busy again. We are already working on new cards and other items that we’ll share with you soon. Equally important, we are currently dealing with the cumbersome task of organizing the production process of all the various items we’ll deliver to you next year! It’s not exactly easy, but we already see some light at the end of the tunnel.

updates.update_userinfo: On New Beginnings and Roads not yet taken
updates.update_content:
Stellar beings,

As already established, we did survive our little post-campaign sabbatical. Be it full-time parenting, not moving at all, playing Valheim or adventures in the webcomic realms, we managed to have this much needed time apart from all things Sefirot.
But this has come to an end now. Things are afoot on numerous fronts and we are happy to share some updates with you.

Stellar beings,

We just passed the finishing line. What a final sprint that was! We couldn't peel our eyes off the screen and are eternally thankful that so many of you have decided to support in these last hours.
We can't even describe how we feel now. We are certainly exhausted. Sefirot started as a small side project with some sheets of paper and a very used up Tarot deck in 2017, and look what has become of it: a sizable community of people that share a passion for this particular mix of card game and divination, and of course the artistic aspect through which that materializes.

Stellar beings,
Only a few more hours left.
One more stretch goal has been unlocked.

updates.update_userinfo: But there is one more thing ...
updates.update_content:
Stellar beings,

All too soon this first leg of our voyage will come to an end. Things seem to get more busy now and our wonderful group has grown to more than 5000 backers overnight!
Yesterday we had a very nice and chatty live stream session with our artists. All the great questions of the universe were touched upon, while a new card was being crafted. You can still take a glimpse at the stream’s recording to find out what that mysterious next card might be:

updates.update_userinfo: On Last Orders, Live Streams & Moving Goals
updates.update_content:
Stellar beings,

The clock is ticking without mercy and we are now entering the last three days of this adventure! The winds are starting to pick up and with these fresh gales, we might well reach our next destination, the Lovers!

Hello, I’m Tangmo! I am a popsurreal illustrator based in the Midwest. I started designing pins late 2019 and through  lot of learning, I’m excited to unveil this pin collection to you! The Angelic Visions enamel pin set is based on descriptions of biblical angels with my own twist. These pins showcase the strangeness and beauty of the heavens and you have a chance to own these unique pins at Kickstarter exclusive prices!
NOTE: I’m sorry to UK backers, but due to VAT laws I’m unable to offer rewards to you at this time :( They will be listed on Etsy after fulfillment period ends because Etsy remits VAT on the seller's behalf!
*UPDATE* ALL BONUS GIFTS UNLOCKED

FUNDING
Funding will go towards:
Pin production

ABOUT KICKSTARTER
Thanks to Kickstarter, you can pledge now and secure your spot without worrying about having the  money taken out of your account until the end of the campaign and only if it succeeds! If you pledge now, you get access to early bird specials and help my campaign reach its goal faster. You are free to change your card, address, pledge, or cancel at any point before the campaign ends :)

March 8th: Kickstarter launches!
March 31st: Kickstarter ends! I will send out surveys ASAP and once they are all answered and funding reaches my account, I will place the order.
Mid-April: Pin production begins! Pins take around 1-1 ½ months to produce.
May 15th-30th: Pins arrive at my doorstep! I will inspect each one to ensure quality and start packaging them so they can be sent to you.
June: All pins are packaged and sent to you!

WHERE TO FIND ME
TikTok | Twitter | Instagram
I also have a shop and my current pin designs can be bought here along with other art goods! >> Online shop <<

campaign.story:
THE CURIOUS TRAVELS DECK
The Curious Travels Tarot Deck, created by Mia Rozear, is comprised of 78 original watercolor illustrations. Each card reflects the traditional symbolisms of the Rider-Waite deck with an original stylistic twist. 
What makes this deck special is not only its traditional value, but also its ability to tell a new story. With just one flip-through of this deck you will find strength underneath a lion's gaze, wander with knights and kings, and dance beside stars.  I hope everyone who experiences this deck will feel like they are part of its story, as I did when I created them.  
Major Arcana (please note: metallic ink will shine brighter when printed)
To hear more about the creation process, behind the scenes footage, and more, check out this Art Prof interview!
ABOUT THE DECK
- Each of the 78 original cards are hand painted with water color and gold leaf paint. A  border and back design were added digitally.
- Each card is 2.75" x 4.75"
- The deck will come in a custom tuck-box
- The gold detailing on each card and the tuck box will be printed with metallic ink
Edit: The original 300 coreless value paper will be upgraded to better quality, stronger cardstock! I'm leaning towards Black Core Premium cardstock with linen texture, which is very durable and satisfying to hold. This is subject to change, as I'm still doing lots of research to provide you with the best quality card deck possible. Thank you so much for your patience! 

Suit of Wands & Cups (please note: metallic ink will shine brighter when printed)
Suit of Swords & Pentacles (please note: metallic ink will shine brighter when printed)

Card Box + Backing Design (please note: designs may change slightly before printing)
ABOUT MIA
My friends and I have always been interested in creative and mystical things. My friend Charlotte introduced me to tarot in high school. "Some artists make their own decks,” she told me, “it’s a crazy project to take on, there are 78 cards.” The thought of a project of that scale excited me, and Charlotte’s words kept rolling around in my mind for years. As my friends and I delved deeper into reading tarot, my interest accelerated, and I began researching the history and symbolism around the Rider-Waite deck.
process sketches
A project this intense deserved my complete attention, which wasn't possible as a full-time college student. When the 2020 quarantine drove the world into lockdown, I realized this was the window of opportunity I needed to start. 
Arthur Waite, co-creator of the traditional Rider-Waite deck and author of Key to the Tarot, describes tarot as an art form that “embodies symbolical presentations of universal ideas, behind which lie all the implicits of the human mind”. I filled an entire sketchbook with notes as I studied his writings, completely enthralled by the little stories he described within each card. I decided that in my own deck, I would try and retell these stories through my own contemporary artistic language.
progress sketches
I first sketched all of the designs lightly with ballpoint pens on watercolor paper. Then, I painted over each card with watercolors given me by my grandmother, a professional artist who taught me to paint when I was five years old. While I worked through the deck, I discovered a small jar of gold leaf paint in a box of my old art supplies. I added a few details onto one of the cards on a whim, and fell in love with how beautifully the gold reflected light.
The day finally came when I walked into my kitchen with all 78 cards piled high in my hands, ready to declare the project complete. I have entered 2021 having created something I am genuinely proud of, and I would love to share it with you all!
The Deck, unedited (please note: borders will be added on printed cards)
STRETCH GOALS
$12,000--- Two Piece Box UNLOCKED!
The original tuck-box has been upgraded to a lightweight two piece box, with metallic gold detailing. Artwork will be similar to the tuck box design above (finalized design coming soon!)
$15,000 + --- Extras UNLOCKED!
As we progress past $15,000 (wow!), I am working on special add-ons for those who backed The Deck tier and above! Some of these add-ons will include:
An extra card design
Enamel pins
Custom tea-towels with a Curious Travels inspired design, which you can use as a spread for tarot reading!
I am currently working on developing the artwork for all of these bonus items, and will update as soon as they're ready! For those who were interested in the Line Art Deck and coloring book options, I will still aim to sell those outside of this Kickstarter campaign later this year. Thank you all so much for your patience!   
please note: not all rewards are pictured
REWARDS
Based on your pledge, you can receive one or more of the items listed below (please see right column for further pledge details):
Curious Postcard: A personalized note of thanks from the artist (me!) which will be mailed on a Curious Travels postcard
Sticker Pack: A pack of 5 tarot card stickers! 
Cards included: The High Priestess, The Empress, Strength, Queen of Cups, and Temperance
Print Package: Two 8" x 14" semi-gloss cardstock prints 
Cards pictured: Temperance, in color; The Hanged Man, line art B+W
Temperance Tapestry: A 34" x 40" cloth wall tapestry of the Temperance card
The Deck: Receive the Curious Travels Tarot Deck, complete with 78 beautiful illustrations and metallic ink details
Custom Artwork: A custom pen & ink drawing inspired by your name or a name of your choosing, in the Curious Travels art style (around 4" x 4") 
The Deck, unedited (please note: borders will be added on printed cards)
To see more of my artwork and Tarot content, follow my Instagram: @arozear

TIMELINE / SHIPPING
After the goal is met, it will take 6-8 weeks for me to receive the decks and ship them. Currently, the USPS is overwhelmed with deliveries, so exact delivery dates are hard to pin down. However, I can assure you that I will be prepared to package and ship all orders as quickly as I possibly can!
I am unable to offer international shipping for this Kickstarter and it's rewards. If the deck is funded, I hope to open international shipping on my website so the deck will be available to everyone! I'm sorry for the wait, thank you so much for understanding.

I hope all of you are having an amazing day! This morning at 10:00 am EST, the Curious Travels Tarot Deck's Kickstarter campaign came to a close. Not only is the deck completely funded, but we raised enough to upgrade cardstock, the box, and more! I am blown away. Again, from the bottom of my heart, thank you.

updates.update_userinfo: The Final Stretch! Improved Card Stock, Add-Ons, and More
updates.update_content:
Hello again!

It feels so weird to say this, but this campaign is almost over! Again, I'll start this update by saying a huge thank you for your support-- none of this would be possible without you.

Hello everyone!
WOW, we just reached $15,000 and I am blown away! This response is fantastic, and I want to thank you all again for your continued support. I'm writing today with a few stretch goal updates. After a few responses and polls, I have made some changes that will better serve all of you wonderful backers! They are as follows:

Hello everyone!
Wow, this week has been incredible. Not only is the deck FULLY funded, but we've just unlocked the $12,000 reward tier! Now I will be able to print both the full deck in color and in simple black and white line-art. 
I can't even begin to thank all of you for your support. This feels so surreal, and I am so excited to be on this journey with all of you!

Hi everyone! 
This Kickstarter has only been live for a day, and we're already well on our way to meeting the goal! I'd like to say thank you, from the bottom of my heart. 
I have also made an edit regarding international shipping. While I cannot offer international shipping for this Kickstarter or it's rewards, I do hope on offering it when I sell decks on my website (if everything is funded). I am so sorry for the long wait, and I appreciate your patience!

campaign.story:
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT が生まれた理由
Beliefs in Japan and Animation Culture
japanese anime tarot
*The name of the reward is japanimation tarot, but it has been changed to JAPANESE ANIME TAROT.

In Japan, the concept of Shinto has been practiced as a traditional belief in nature and ethnicity.　Many Japanese still believe in Shinto today.　Furthermore, in this modern time, people are blindly deepening their beliefs in some specific objects in the world of animations and cartoons which are two-dimensional and also idols on screens.　To that extent, Japanese animation culture is attracting many Japanese people. 

This applies to not only Japanese people but also for people around the world.　Shinto does not have any specific religious faction. It is an animistic and an ethnic religion based on some myths, multitudinous gods, nature and natural phenomenon.　And the Latin word “anima” which is the origin of the word “animism” means “to give a life to something that cannot move without life” and it is actually the etymology of animation.
In other words, the animation culture can be originated from the culture that gives life to all lifeless things and move them, respects them, and believes in them.

The reason why Japanese animation has attracted so much attention is that there is so much energy in creative objects that are created by Japanese creators who have believed in animism genealogically. 
And the cards that are made based on such

And the cards that are made based on such wisdoms are the JAPANESE ANIME TAROT.
日本では、伝統的な自然信仰・民族信仰として、神道という考え方が行われてきました。
今日も多くの日本人は、神道を信仰しています。

また、現代では、人はアニメーションや二次元と呼ばれるアニメ・漫画世界の中の特定の対象や画面上のアイドルに対して盲目的なまでに信仰を深めています。
それほどにまで日本のアニメーション文化は日本の多くの人々の心をとらえています。それは日本のみならず世界の人々に対しても言えることです。

神道とは、特定の宗派を持たず、神話、八百万の神、自然や自然現象などにもとづくアニミズム的・祖霊崇拝的な民族宗教です。
そして、アニミズムという言葉の元となった「アニマ」という言葉はラテン語で「生命がなく動くことのできない物に命を与えて動けるようにする」という意味があり、実はアニメーション（アニメ）の語源となっているのです。
つまり、アニメーション文化は、全ての命のないものに命を与えて動かし、それを尊び、信仰するという文化から生まれたものなのです。

なぜ日本のアニメーションがこれほど世界から注目されているのかと言えば、脈々とアニミズムを信仰し続けて生きた系譜のある日本のクリエイティブの場合このエネルギーが非常に強いため、これほど世界各国から人気を得ることが出来るようになったのです。
そして、その叡智が取り入れられたカードが、このJAPANESE ANIME TAROTなのです。
78 cards all original illustration.
 About the tarot deck Cards 
These 78 cards are made by the inspiration from the rider edition and there is no extra energy needed when you do your reading.
The essence of the card will appeal to you and your senses, and you can bring out your own feeling more smoothly even when it is used for your readings.
It is said that Japanese people tend to be delicate.It is obvious by looking at the culture and the life styles.This delicacy is probably the special characteristic when it comes to art even in a worldwide view and art pieces such as ink paintings and ukiyo-e arts are created by seeking beauty in fine details.
This project of the tarot cards was started with the thought that is to heal the hearts of all the people in the world and make them happy by the power of all the wisdoms, the senses and the unique views of Japanese arts.

このカードはライダー版からインスピレーションを受けて作成されている78枚のカードで構成されており、
リーディングのためにあなたには余計なエネルギーがかかりません。
貴方の感覚にカードの必要なエッセンスが訴えかけてきて、リーディングに使用する際も、貴方自身のフィーリングをより円滑に引き出すことが出来ます。
日本人は、繊細であると言われます。
それは、特に文化や人々の生活を見ていれば分かります。
この繊細さはおそらく、世界的に見ても日本人の芸術的観点から見れば優れた特筆すべき特徴であり、水墨画や浮世絵など、古来より細かいところまでこだわった美しさを求めて芸術作品を完成させてきました。
それら日本独特の世界観や芸術的感覚を生かし、我々が持てる全ての叡智を集結させ、アニメーションイラストの力で本当に世界中の人々の心を癒しで包み込み幸せにできるような作品を作りたいという思いで、今回のタロットカードの企画がはじまりました。

 How JAPANESE ANIME TAROT was created 
in production and finished
Have you ever seen a Japanese animated tarot with beautiful graphics made for the world?
In fact, most animated tarot cards are not planned or designed in Japan. However, this tarot cards are different.
This tarot cards are planned and created by a Japanese creative team of a Japanese company called Luna Factory, and the Japanese designers who have the intention of making beautiful and lovely tarot cards to fit into the Japanese sense and making tarot cards more familiar to Japanese people.
Many animated tarot cards are actually different from the original Japanese illustrations in a sense.
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT is made to match the delicate and aesthetic sense of Japanese culture.
This also applies to the quality. Japanese quality requirements are known as being very strict.
In other countries, there are many factories that would not accept orders from Japanese customers since their requests are very specific and they expect quick responses.
All the matte-finish cards (78 cards), instructions, and the box are highly qualified because the company, “Luna Factory”, which is highly evaluated by many strict Japanese customers, has planned and maintain the quality. Please experience the high quality of Japanese products that are different from some other products.

あなたは今まで日本人が世界に向けて作った美しいグラフィックのアニメタロットを見たことがありますか？
実はほとんどのアニメ風のタロットカードは、日本で企画・デザインされていません。
ですが、このタロットカードは違います。
日本人が日本人の感覚に合うように、綺麗で可愛らしいタロットカードを制作しよう。
もっとタロットに親しみを持って使ってもらおう、
という意思を持って、日本の株式会社であるルナファクトリーという会社のクリエイティブチーム（全員日本人）が企画して日本人デザイナーの手によって作りあげられたカードなのです。
今までの多くのアニメーション風のタロットカードは、日本人の感覚で見ると日本人のイラストとは雰囲気の違ったものに感じられました。
JAPANESE ANIME TAROTは、日本人の繊細で日本文化に沿った美的感覚に合うように作られています。
それは、品質面においても言えることです。
日本人の品質要求は、非常に厳しいことで世界にも知られています。
あまりに要求が厳しく返品率も高いので、
日本以外の国では日本人向けに販売する商品は作れないと、日本向けの商品を作ってくれない工場も多数あります。
ですが、このタロットカードは厳しい日本のお客様に対しても多数のカードを販売し高評価を受けている、「ルナファクトリー」が企画し品質管理しているカードなので、
マットなカード（７８枚）と説明書と箱からイラストの細部に至るまで、全ての品質が高いです。
雑や手抜きという言葉とは縁遠い、日本の高品質を体感してください。

Quality of the Tarot Deck
tarot booklet & tarot deck box
• These 78 cards have undergone matte processing to minimize scratches during use and they are printed carefully to pass the strict standards in Japan.
• The original beautiful illustrations are printed in the bottom and the top of the cards (including the box and the lid). The designs would also heal you by just looking at it.
• The original booklet, "The Japanese Tarot Guide Book" is included so that even beginners can start reading right away. 
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT is made based on the world's bestselling rider tarot cards. Whether you are a  beginner who will enter the world of tarot cards soon, or you are already familiar with cards, even as a professional collector, our cards will be a perfect recommendation for anyone showing interest in tarot.
• マット加工により使用時についてしまう傷などが極力入らないように施し、印刷にもこだわり抜き、日本の厳しい規格にも耐えた78枚のカード
• カードのボトムとTOP（ボックスと蓋）にもオリジナル美麗イラストが入っています。眺めていても癒されるような仕様
• 初心者でもすぐにリーディングできるようにオリジナルブックレット「JAPANESE ANIME TAROT GUIDE BOOK」が付属。
JAPANESE ANIME TAROTは世界で最も売れている「ライダー版タロットカード」に準拠した形で製作されております。ですので他のカードで慣れている方もこれからタロットカードの世界に入る初心者の方にも、コレクターの方にも、全てのタロットカードが好き・興味があるという方にお勧めできるカードとなっております。

Major Arcana
Major Arcana
With regard to the Major Arcana, all the cards are based on the original taste but have a modern animation style that makes you feel refreshed and healed by just taking a look. The tarot cards are made with advanced sense of Japan in the 21 centuries, so the cards would give appropriate inspiration to familiar problems and increasing anxiety in current days.
大アルカナに関しては元の世界観を踏襲しながらも、現代のアニメーション風になっていて見ているだけで元気になり癒されるようなカードばかりです。
21世紀の日本の先進的な感性で作られたタロットカードだから身近な問題、今の時代ならではの悩みにも適切なインスピレーションを与えてくれるカードになっております。
PLAY


0.THE FOOL（愚者）
In the rider edition, this card shows a young man walking on a cliff by ignoring the dog’s advice, but the card is designed to capture the world more positively by making him look like an adventurer. The positive expressions and gestures of the young man shows his positive feeling.
こちらのカードは青年が犬の忠告を無視して崖を歩いている様子がライダー版にもありますが、そちらを冒険者のような風貌な青年にすることでより前向きに世界をとらえるような構成になっています。
青年のポジティブな表情や仕草から前向きな気持ちが伺えます。
THE FOOL

6.THE LOVERS（恋人）
This beautiful animation depicts the lovers who are facing each other.
They are holding each other's hands, but looking at somewhere different.
The expression of various views of romantic loves are described delicately.
恋人たちが向き合っている様子を美麗なアニメーションで表現されています。
お互い手を握っているのに、どこか視線が合っていない様子が表現されており、
恋愛観の多角化が表象している様子も繊細に描かれています。
THE LOVERS

8.STRENGTH（力）
In this card, the power of kindness that are not only depended on physical strength, but also harmonizing with a lion is described. The illustration is very healing just by looking at it. The real power that can solve any problematic situation with people who look fierce by the power of harmony is shown.
こちらのカードでは物理的な力のない少女が単純に力でいなすのではなくライオンと仲睦まじい様子で相容れるということも力であるという優しさの力が描写されています。
見ているだけで癒されるようなイラストで、一見狂暴そうな相手とも調和の力をもってすれば状況は打開できるという本当の力のありようが見て取れます。
STRENGTH


19.THE SUN（太陽）
It is visually pure and clean, with a girl looking away from the sun, but in contrast, the expression of the sun, the lovely girl, and the sunflowers indicates the peace.
よりピュアで純粋なビジュアル。
太陽に背を向けた姿ですが、それに対してより温かな印象を抱いていけるような太陽の表情と可愛い少女とひまわりは平和を感じさせます。
THE SUN
back side
  The back side of the card is also carefully produced,   
and the specifications are such that upright and reversed are unknown.
カードの裏面も拘って制作されており、正位置逆位置のわからない仕様になっています。

back side of each deck

Minor Arcana
Minor Arcana
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT surely focuses on fine details for the Minor Arcana as well.
It is not only for Major Arcana. You can feel the soul of Japanese craftsmanship that are dedicated to fine details with all the intentions in every pieces of Minor Arcana.
You can feel the soul of Japanese craftsmanship that are dedicated to fine details with all the intentions in every pieces of Minor Arcana. The illustrations stimulate some thoughts, feelings, and inspirations that come from the cards, with the respect for each meanings and inspirations.
Please feel the unique characteristics and flavors of the cards.
Those cards are composed of the elements such as consideration for healing sensitive and delicate minded people in the world and the kindness of Japanese people towards other people which Luna Factory cherishes as in our brand concept.
That is THE JAPAN TAROT of Luna Factory.

JAPANESE ANIME TAROT はもちろん小アルカナにも繊細なこだわりがあります。
大アルカナだけではありません。
小アルカナの1枚1枚にこそ、注意深く丁寧に細部までこだわった日本のものづくりの魂を感じることが出来ます。
それぞれの意味やインスピレーションを尊重し、
想いやフィーリング、カードから来るひらめきを活性化させるようなイラストです。
カード独自の個性と趣をぜひ感じとってください。
PLAY

*Due to the mockup being produced, we plan to correct spelling mistakes and deliver it.

About Our Team
We are a Japanese company called Luna Factory.
Based on our concept which is "Spreading a fortune-telling culture, gently embracing the world, and healing to make people happy ", we develop and sell our original tarot cards /oracle cards on a daily basis, and through the sales of fortune-telling and healing goods, we aim to make our customers smile as much as possible.
Our company puts main focuses on the corporate philosophy, hires a large number of creatively talented people, produces our products that are focused to develop the products which are really desired by customers by hearing each customer’s opinion without using marketing strategies to sell our products.
Luna Factory produced tarot cards consist finely considered illustrations and it will not disappoint the customer who use them.Since it is designed with such thoughts and the passions, all the cards are made with lots of hearts and passions of the designers, planners, and producers.
You feel blessed by using the cards for fortune-telling.
Your customer smiles by receiving your future reading.
People would be healed just by looking at the cards.

我々は、日本の株式会社で、株式会社ルナファクトリーと申します。
「占い文化を広め、世界を優しく包み込み、人々を癒しで幸せにする。」
ことをコンセプトに、日々オリジナルタロットカード・オラクルカードの開発・販売を行い、占いや癒しグッズの販売を通じて、かかわって下さるお客様を一人でも多く笑顔にすることを目指しています。
弊社は、上記の企業理念を何よりも重く考え、クリエイティブ方面に長けた人材を多数登用し、マーケティング戦略を用いて商品を販売するために作るのではなく、一人一人のお客様の声をお伺いし生まれた、「本当にお客様が欲しい商品」を開発することに重きを置いた製品作りを行っております。
ルナファクトリーのタロットカードたちは細部までこだわったイラストで構成されており、手に取って下さったお客様の期待を裏切りません。
お客様が占いに使って幸せになる、
鑑定をうけたお客様がより笑顔になる、
見ているだけで癒される…
そんな様子を考えながらデザインされておりますので、
全ての種類のカードに設計師や職人の『こだわりと想い』が詰まっているのです。

Seeking Global Sales Partners
Our company "LUNA FACTORY" has been selling only in Japan currently. However, there has been many people from overseas who know the cuteness and the attractiveness of our products showing their interest through Instagram and twitter and other on SNS. As a result of various adjustments and discussions within our company, as well as the progress in logistics routes and communications with delivery companies, we are finally ready to expand our products to overseas. And now, we are also looking for partners who would like to sell our products around the world.
Customers who purchase a wholesale plan in the crowdfunding project can obtain “ the right to purchase THE ANIMATION TAROT at the wholesale price from next time by becoming a sales partner with Luna Factory.” Let's take this opportunity to become a sales partner with our company. And with the power of fortune-telling, let's change the world into a happier and kind hearted world.
With people who sympathize with our philosophy, we would like to become a partner, and heal and change the world together. Please help us to change the world with tender loving fortune-telling together!

弊社LUNA FACTORYは今まで日本だけで販売していました。
ですが、instagramやtwitterなどのSNSを通じて、
可愛さや弊社製品の魅力を知って下さった多くの海外の方から「買いたい」「欲しい」というお声をかけて頂き、
弊社内で様々な調整を重ねて検討し、物流ルートなどや配送業者とのやりとりなども進めた結果、やっと弊社も海外に商品を展開する準備が整いました。
そして現在、弊社の商品を世界中で販売してくれるパートナー企業様も探しています。
クラウドファンディングプロジェクトにおいてホールセールプランを買っていただいたお客様には、「ルナファクトリーの販売パートナーになることで、次回からもTHE ANIMATION TAROTをホールセールプライスで購入できる権利」がついてきます。
是非、この機会に弊社と販売パートナーになりましょう。
そして、占いの力で世界をもっと幸せに包まれた優しい世界に変えていきましょう。
その理念に共感してくださる方と、是非もっともっと多くパートナーになり、共に世界を癒しで包み込み優しく変えていきたいです。
一緒に優しい占いで世界を変えるための手助けをしてください！

Post Script
lunafactory logo
This is the first time we offer a partnership on kick-starter.
Until now, we only sold our products to our customers in Japan little by little.
However, we are certain that our particularly made products would satisfy people in all over the world.
We started this project as a kick-starter to protect our philosophy which is "spreading a fortune-telling culture, gently embracing the world, and healing to make people happy", and to make more customers smile not only in Japan but around the world.

今回は、初のkickstarterでの募集となります。
今までは日本で自社の製品を少しずつお客様に販売しているだけでした。
ですが、このこだわりの製品は必ずや世界の人々にご満足いただけるであろうと確信しております。
今後も弊社の「占い文化を広め、世界を優しく包み込み、人々を癒しで幸せにする。」ことを守り抜き、日本だけでなくより多く世界中のお客様を笑顔にできればと考え、kickstarterでプロジェクトを始動させました。
是非みなさまの喜びの声も聞かせてください！
よろしくお願いします。

Please let us hear your voice of joy! Thank you and we wish you all the best!

campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Sturdy box.
Durable booklet.
Matte cards (78 cards per set).
It is a high-quality card that can withstand the strict quality requirements of Japanese people. Based on the experience that we sold a large number of tarot cards in Japan and have enjoyed a high reputation here, we can guarantee our product quality for you to make an order without any hesitate.

ハードボックス。
ハードブックレット。
７８枚のマット加工の高品質カード。
これらは、日本で多数のタロットカードを販売してきている上で、
商品クオリティについても高い品質を受けている弊社なので、
心配なくご注文いただけます。
Reusability and recyclability
To avoid the waste of packing materials, we are using high-quality packing materials that are often used in Japan instead. We will pack our product with the least materials, and deliver them to you in sturdy and reusable envelopes.

梱包材は極力使用せず、頑丈な再利用可能な封筒を使用してお届けします。
高品質の日本でよく使われる梱包材を使用することで、
無駄な量の梱包材を使用せずに済みます。
Sustainable materials
We use high-quality paper for our tarot cards, 
but they will also be reusable once they are discarded.

タロットカードに使用される材料として、
高品質の紙を使用しますが、
それらは廃棄された場合、
再利用可能な紙となっております。
Environmentally friendly factories
Whether the factory is paying well not just by senior management, and whether they treat their employees fairly, has been carefully considered during our supplier selection and management. 
And also, only those factories who are eco-friendly enough during manufacturing processes and reuse their waste products well, can be finally chosen as our partners. 

従業員を公平に扱い、上層部だけが儲けるのではなく、賃金をしっかり支払っている工場かどうかを考慮しています。
環境への負担を抑え、
廃棄物が少ない工場を優先して採用しています。
弊社へ配送する際も、
無駄な梱包材は排除し、
高品質で丈夫な輸送箱を使用することで、
より綺麗な状態で、無駄なく弊社に届けられる工場を選択します。
Sustainable Distribution
These suppliers are asked to use high-quality and durable boxes for shipping, eliminating unnecessary packing materials, so that products can be delivered to us in a better condition without any waste.

輸送経路の最適化を測ります。
国内工場でのチェック作業を行い、
そのまま該当工場から配送作業を行う、
レーンシステムを導入することで、
無駄のない効率的な配送を可能としています。
Something else
We use a proper amount of lightweight and recyclable materials for packing, and make our efforts to improve packing method which can protect the products from any transit damage. These have been totally introduced company-wide and been implemented strictly.

軽量でリサイクル可能な梱包材を適量だけ使用し、かつ痛みが発生しないような梱包を工夫し、全社的に導入しています。

We each employee works in consideration of the global environment.

campaign.story:
I launched the original Tarotbot in 2019. It went well. With the help from the Kickstarter and Tarot community, I was able to get them printed and shipped out.
Having never produced a deck of cards before, I wasn't quite sure what to expect.
That being said, there were a few things that I was not personally satisfied with. 

First - the box. The box was not what I had imagined at all, and I felt that I could improve on it drastically. The new box is a more sturdy box with a top and bottom. It will be matte black with uv coating accents. 
Second - the accompanying booklet. This was a small insert that provided some great information, but it wasn't very substantial. Not a lot to it. The new booklet is a guide to the major arcana. While the majority of the pages are dedicated to the Major Arcana, there will also be meanings for the suits and the bonus cards as well. Is will conveniently fit in the box with the cards and will be about 26-30 pages long.
Third - the finish. I got them glossy. A lot of people really love the gloss, but I felt like it may be a little too much. I want to see what it will be like in a matte finish.
Fourth - the lack of borders. I had originally designed my cards with borders, but changed my mind midway through the last campaign. While I still love the borderless version, I have a feeling that the black borders will help everything pop. 

With all of these changes, I still wanted to add a little extra to make this version stand out from the original. Here are some more changes.

Backs - Instead of the gold foil stamping, I am opting for a black foil stamping. I have a feeling it will give them a unique quality that is not found in a lot of decks.
Bonus cards - With the last printing, I includes 4 unique bonus cards - This time around I am adding an additional 6 bonus cards for a total of 10 bonus cards.  I really like creating these cards, and I may just go crazy and do an entire Oracle deck eventually.

I am really excited to take the knowledge I have gained from the first version of Tarotbot and create another unique version. I really hope you enjoy these additions.
Please enjoy some of the images of the deck below.

Addresses

I have sent them over all of the print files, and they are working on getting me a timeline and proofs. We are in good shape, but I think delivery may be in July instead of June, depending on production time and transit time.
Thanks again! Here is one of the bonus cards!

Over 350% funded! Thank you all so much. This has been a fun campaign.
Next steps! 
I am finalizing the bonus cards, guide book, and getting a new quote from the printer (more bonus cards = new quote).
Once I am ready for the surveys, I will send them out (it may take a few weeks though for that) - Thanks again! I am hoping that I can have this in your hands sometime in June-July.

Two more days left!
Right now there will be 14 bonus cards, for a total of 92 cards! That is almost an oracle deck by itself. Crazy! Thanks so much for all the support, this has been great. Thanks again for the support!
